segments.text: The kitchen design is quite simple, a line drawing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those upper cabinet doors are wide open.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside one, the "COOKIE JAR" stands out, brimming with goodies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's clear the children have discovered their treasure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's precarious climb is all for those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can practically taste the sweetness of those hidden treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the stool looks like it's about to give way at any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole clandestine operation could go very wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they manage to grab their cookies and escape without a tumble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a classic childhood caper, really.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thrill of getting something forbidden must be immense.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is a study in contrasts and unobserved mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I truly hope they don't get hurt from this.
segments.speaker: PAR
